My projects

Portfolio Website Project

This is the project you are currently looking at. This is part of my front-end development course where I have learned HTML and SCSS. I choose to do this project because I'm interested in front-end development.

Take look at the source code

Finnish Game Jam 2023: Beer pong simulator

I participated in the FGJ Event 2023 where I was part of team that developed simple beer pong simulator in Unity Environment. In this project my role was designer. This was my first time to develop 3D game in Unity.

Take look at the FGJ wikipage

Digital cooking recipe book application

This was part of mobile development course where I learned more about the basics of Android Studio. This was my summer project in 2022 and I wanted to do this project because I enjoy cooking and baking.

Take look at the source code

Movie Review Application for Android

This is group project I have developed in object-oriented programming course. We developed an android application for reviewing movies provided by Finnkino's open database. Development environment was Android Studio and we used Java.

Take look at the source code
